name: Matemasjov
description:
This game is a Danish serious game that focuses on teaching small kids basic mathematics, more directly to count and to calculate.

The game is about a character called Bastian, he has a messed room and he needs your help to clean it up. The game is made up of several small mini-games, each corresponding to a toy and once you have finished the related mini-game, the toy will be cleaned up and you will now be one step closer to helping Bastian clean up his room.

The game is on Danish.
